GPIOModule.Description: Standalone General Purpose Input/Output module for simple digital IO operations, designed for educational and verification purposes without external dependencies.

Features.IndependentInputFiltering: Each input can be individually filtered to stabilize noisy signals before being read internally.
Features.FlexibleOutputControl: Direct control over each GPIO pin's output state and output enable state via internal registers.

gpio_input.Description: 32-bit input reflecting external signals or pin states, potentially noisy and requiring stabilization.

Effects.Filtered: Each bit is filtered through a simple debounce logic before being used internally.
Effects.UsedForInterrupts: Filtered inputs are monitored for edge detections to generate interrupts.

gpio_output.Description: 32-bit output directly controlled by internal register 'direct_out'.
gpio_output.ControlledBy: direct_out register determines the level of each GPIO output pin.

gpio_output_enable.Description: 32-bit output enable signal controlled by internal register 'direct_oe'.
gpio_output_enable.ControlledBy: direct_oe register enables output functionality of GPIO pins, allowing outputs to drive external circuits.

direct_out.Description: Register controlling the output levels of GPIO pins.

Interaction.DirectMapping: Each bit of this register directly sets the corresponding GPIO output.

direct_oe.Description: Register controlling the output enable state of GPIO pins.

Interaction.DirectMapping: Each bit of this register directly enables or disables the output driver for the corresponding GPIO pin.

Interrupts.Description: Generates interrupts based on edge detection on GPIO inputs.

Logic.RisingEdge: Interrupt is generated when a rising edge is detected on any GPIO input configured for it.
Logic.FallingEdge: Interrupt is generated when a falling edge is detected on any GPIO input configured for it.

InputOutputMapping.Description: Explains how inputs are mapped to outputs based on internal logic and settings.

Details.Condition: Output follows input when corresponding output enable bit is set.

DesignImplementation.SimplifiedModel: Focuses on essential GPIO functionalities with mocked internal behaviors for easy testing and integration

KeyLogicImplementations.Filtering: Debounces inputs to stabilize them before processing.
KeyLogicImplementations.OutputControl: Uses simple bitwise logic to control outputs based on internal register values.
